hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: POM_VERSION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The maven version number for the build

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: REMOTE_DOCKER_HOST
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The url of the EC2 instance that will be running the container based on the docker image wrapping the newly built war file. Example: 10.57.237.84

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ECR_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The url of the elastic container registry (ECR) where the newly created image is to be pushed to from this server and pulled from by the target docker host for the image wrapping the newly built war file.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set +x
# Remove any dangling items if [ -n "$(docker images --filter dangling=true -q)" ] ; then docker rmi -f $(docker images --filter dangling=true -q); echo "Removed dangling image(s)"; else echo "No dangling images to remove"; fi if [ -n "$(docker volume ls -qf dangling=true)" ] ; then docker volume rm $(docker volume ls -qf dangling=true); echo "Removed dangling volume(s)"; else echo "No dangling volumes to remove"; fi
echo ${POM_VERSION}
# Login to the registry # NOTE: info on how to store credentials can be found at: # http://docs.aws.amazon.com/cli/latest/topic/config-vars.html # requires ~/.aws/config eval $(/usr/local/aws/bin/aws ecr get-login --profile sandbox)
# Build the app image (the image will curl the jenkins war artifact into itself while it is building). docker build \ -t ${ECR_URL}:${POM_VERSION} \ --build-arg SOURCE_WAR=localhost:8080/job/hello-world-build/ws/target/hello-world-${POM_VERSION}.war \ https://github.com/bu-ist/kuali-research-docker.git#master:hello-world/build.context
# Push the newly created image to the registry docker push ${ECR_URL}:${POM_VERSION}
## Execute a docker command over ssh on the application host to run a container against the new image in the registry ssh \ jenkins@${REMOTE_DOCKER_HOST} \ -i /var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/bu_kuali_id_jenkins_rsa "set -x && docker ps && " \ "docker rm -f hwcontainer || echo 'No container to remove.' && " \ "docker ${ECR_URL}:${POM_VERSION} && " \ "docker run" \ " -d" \ " -p 8080:8080" \ " --restart unless-stopped" \ " --name hwcontainer" \ "${ECR_URL}:${POM_VERSION} && " \ "docker ps"
set -x
